name: Patatas In Madness: REHEATED (ridiculously early) Demo v -1
name_original: Patatas In Madness: REHEATED (ridiculously early) Demo v -1
description:
Slay the tomatoes with your Potato Cannon in this retro action platformer game!

NOTE: An anti-virus might detect the game as a virus, let the analysis occur. 

This happens because the game was made in a discontinued program.

If you see any, bugs report them! I'll try my best to fix them.

This game is a very early prototype, feedback is appreciated!

Listen to the OST Here! 

Follow me for pixelart and PIM:R development!
